attributes.action: We would like you to recall 6 seater & 8 seater taxi/private hire vehicles back
attributes.additional_details: It is affecting drivers wages due to not earning the ‘6 or 8 seater’ amount, it’s affecting customers with family’s bigger than 4, ie sending 2x vehicles would cost more money that ordering a 6 seater. Also if a single mother is with her 4 children how will she get them all home? It’s affecting companies and also before this we had them around for many years without any issues, aswell as 8 seaters
attributes.background: You recently have stopped 6 & 7 seater vehicles being able to be plated as a taxi/pvt hire in Northamptonshire customers need them back, companies need them back and drivers need to be able to earn the correct wage in the vehicles

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the terms of licences for private hire vehicles are a matter for individual licensing authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
